issue.title: [Java] Implement splitAndTransfer for UnionVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-241](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-241). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This method was never implemented, and currently is a no op. We should at least do the naive "copy" version of the method.
